bug.author: lachhebo
bug.description: Hello, In the documentation of knn, it is said that : we can choose an algorithm between BallTree, KDTree ,brute-force and auto. However, The Ball Tree structure is always applied with decision_function() : If we train a knn with X_train and the algorithm parameter set to KDTree : It will evaluate decision_score on X_test with a Ball Tree. Could you modify the code to allow the use of KDTree or brut-force on the testing dataset.

comments.comment: Thanks for spotting this. This inconsistency is caused by fixing <denchmark-link:https://github.com/yzhao062/pyod/issues/23>#23</denchmark-link> . We now force the kNN model to use ball tree to be compatible with more distance metrics. I will update the documentation (and code) soon. Thanks again. Yue
By the way, the radius parameter is also not used with the Ball Tree : I think it can be easily fixed by using the function query_radius() instead of query in the decision_function .
